title: List Profile Addresses
description: List Profile Addresses specific to the current profile.

limit.description: Specifies the number of addresses to be fetched starting from offset. In case this is not present, complete list of the addresses are retrieved starting from offset record.

queryFormat.description: queryFormat to search on the address properties. Possible values SCIM or null.

query.description: SCIM query to search on the address properties.

sort.description: This field determines the sort order of the list to be fetched. eg: id:asc

totalResults.description: Tells whether to include total and totalResults in the SCIM query.By default the value is true
